glosses.gloss: An optical phenomenon resulting from the failure of a lens or mirror to produce a good image

Aberration in optics refers to a defect in a lens such that light is not focused to a point, but is spread out over some region of space, and hence an image formed by a lens with aberration is blurred or distorted, with the nature of the distortion depending on the type of aberration.
An imperfection in image formation by an optical system
A departure of the performance of an optical system from the predictions of paraxial optics
An optical phenomenon resulting from the failure of a lens or mirror to produce a good image.
수차란 상을 맺을 때 한점에서 나온 빛이 광학계를 통한 다음 한점에 모이지 않고 영상이 빛깔이 있어 보이거나 일그러지는 현상이 나타나는 것을 말한다.
In the Dungeons & Dragons fantasy role-playing game, aberration is a type of creature, or "creature type".
A creature type in the role-playing game
Dungeons & Dragons creature type
The aberration of light is an astronomical phenomenon which produces an apparent motion of celestial objects about their true positions, dependent on the velocity of the observer.
An apparent shift in position of celestial objects due to the finite speed of light and the motion of Earth in its orbit around the Sun
Phenomenon in astronomy
The effect by which the apparent direction of distant astronomical bodies is altered by the velocity of the Earth and the finite speed of light.
A small periodical change of position in the stars and other heavenly bodies, due to the combined effect of the motion of light and the motion of the observer.
Astronomy: small periodical change of position of heavenly bodies.
광행차는 지구 공전 운동으로 별빛이 기울어져 관측되는 현상이다.
A state or condition markedly different from the norm
In sociology, deviance describes an action or behavior that violates social norms, including a formally enacted rule, as well as informal violations of social norms.
Actions or behaviors that violate social norms
A state or condition markedly different from the norm.
Actions or behaviors that violate formal and informal cultural norms such as laws and customs.
Person or thing that differs from the expected.
일탈 행동이란 사회에서 규정한 제도나 규범에서 벗어난 행위를 말한다.
Neurosis is an American avant-garde metal band based in Oakland, California.
American band
